Venatori Compound

The Everlight Compound was once the headquarters for all the Venatori in the United States, but the Sanguine Masquerade ran them out except for a handful of families who remained to maintain the archives located there. The majority of the buildings are now run down and empty. The Student Dormintories are the only hospitiable buildings on the Compound. The Archives and the armory are the only other maintained buildings. Other than the few families that remained at the Compound the hunters in Everlight are there to hunt the plethora of supernatural or have been exiled there.

  1. The Archives
  2. Student Dormitories
  3. Adult Residences
  4. Cafeteria and General Store
  5. Armory and Combat Training
  6. The Guest House (dignitaries and big wigs)
  7. Headquarters, Everlight Academy, Infirmary

The Corner Bistro

A busy 24/7 diner that serves the finest pre and post hangover meals including all day breakfast. It´s owned and operated by Dora Bess, an old therian woman with a large family and grandmother to the Leader of Everlight´s Pack.

Frozen

A nightclub owned by Johnny Rose. It caters to townies and vacationers alike featuring sexy pole dancers, half naked servers, private rooms and public 'orgy' rooms. The club is a 'known' vampire den.

The Jade Dragon

A casino owned by the Wei family of Vegas. The Jade Dragon in Everlight is operated by the youngest son Benjamin Wei and may or may not have a tie to the Sanguine Masquerade.
